title: About Bread & Butter
body: After receiving feedback from payroll experts anc business communities around the United States, the IRS will be rolling out a new W-4 Form in 2019. This modifications will includes the ability to withhold the proper amount of federal income tax. Obviously, this will require businesses to make extensives change to current forms and instructions. Learn how your organization can prepare for this change in our W-4 Form eBook.
author: Samuel Adamson
